div.a: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention

h3.span: A Message from the Superintendent - April 28, 2020

span.p: I hope this message finds you healthy and safe. Thank you for your patience as we work to better understand how to best serve you and your children during this global emergency. As we close week seven of remote learning and have over 1 million confirmed COVID-19 cases within our nation’s borders, it has become clearer how we must operate over the next few months.

h3.span: Lake County Joint Financing District Levy

div.span: As Primary Election Day approaches with ballots due to be mailed in by April 28th, we wanted to make you aware of an issue on the ballot that has an effect on our District, the Joint Financing District levy renewal.

Although the Perry Schools Campus is currently closed, Kindergarten Registration is still well underway for all children who will be 5 years old before 9/30/2020. Please click the REGISTRATION/WITHDRAWAL link on the left side of this home page to begin. If you do not have access to a scanner, please take a picture of each required document with your phone, and upload the pictures to your online registration. If you have difficulty with this, please feel free to email the pictures to our Registrar, Ann Aucelli at , she will be more than happy to upload them for you. If you have questions or need additional assistance, please leave a message for Ann at (440) 259-9200 x.9216. She will return your call promptly to assist you.[email protected]
Features include payment options, calendars, and an improved interface.
Visit the Military Wall of Honor webpage.
